author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.

author: John Lennon
quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

author: Douglas Adams
quote: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Eckhart Tolle
quote: The present moment is a powerful goddess.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Sarcasm is the lowest form of wit, but the highest form of intelligence.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fearâ€”not absence of fear.

author: Socrates
quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.

author: Michael J. Fox
quote: Family is not an important thing, it's everything.

author: Tom Lehrer
quote: Life is like a sewer... what you get out of it depends on what you put into it.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

author: Melody Beattie
quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.

author: Socrates
quote: The more I learn, the more I realize how much I don't know.

author: Barbara De Angelis
quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.

author: Aristotle
quote: Wit is educated insolence.
